Ok, I don't really know what you want done with Fliq, so I'm gonna 
have him go get himself together.

::Ramulus/Fliq::

Ramulus sighs, looking at Fliq. "I have to go take care of something, 
Fliq, can you get Brix back to the Cybertronian Fire? We'll give him 
a warrior's funeral."

Fliq nods, tears still running down his face. He turns around, 
transforming and running off toward the Cybertronian Fire, Brix on 
his back.

Ramulus looks after him sadly, sighing and turning around, galloping 
off toward the Alliance base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Sorry I haven't been posting for awhile. Again, my dad with his War 
> Games. Anyway, tomorrow I get on a plane for Washington, and won't 
be 
> back till late Thursday. Please, I beg you, could someone send me 
and 
> e-mail on Thursday, re-capping everything that happened since my 
last 
> post till the RPG. I would owe you so much. Until Thursday, Logo 
can 
> have Starscream and Vulois, and Yanshosh can have Fliq. I don't 
want 
> to give the Trainers to anyone. Their too important. CYA Thursday!
